Name:
Nepeta
Pert
Builder: Morton Engineering and Drydock Co., Ltd., Quebec, Canada
Fate:
Transferred to the US Navy
Sold into mercantile service 18 October 1946
Propulsion: Two 3-drum express boilers, 2,750ihp vertical triple expansion Canadian Vickers engine, one shaft.
Armament:
2 × 3"/50 dual purpose gun mounts
4 × 20 mm gun mounts
3 × .30 cal (7.62 mm) Browning machine guns
1 × Hedgehog
4 × depth charge guns
2 × depth charge chutes
